about.summary: CRC32C implementation with support for CPU-specific acceleration instructions

name: libcrc32c
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "crc32c" %}
{% set version = "1.1.1" %}

package:
  name: lib{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/google/{{ name }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a6533f45b1670b5d59b38a514d82b09c6fb70cc1050467220216335e873074e8

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage("libcrc32c", max_pin="x.x") }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja
  host:
  run:

test:
 commands:
   - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libcrc32c${SHLIB_EXT}  # [unix]
   - test -f $PREFIX/include/crc32c/crc32c.h  # [unix]
   - test -f $PREFIX/lib/cmake/Crc32c/Crc32cTargets.cmake  # [unix]

about:
  home: https://github.com/google/crc32c
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'CRC32C implementation with support for CPU-specific acceleration instructions'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xhochy
